summary: A young peasant boy named Jack climbs a giant beanstalk and stumbles upon a city in the clouds ruled by an evil queen.
cast: Tonpei Hidari|Masachika Ichimura|Nobue Ichitani|Kazuo Kamimura|Kirin Kiki|Takeshi Kusaka|Hiroshi Mizushima|Kô Nishimura|Linda Yamamoto|Jack Grimes|Corinne Orr|Ray Owens|Billie Lou Watt
title: Jack and the Beanstalk
